name: Afifa Iskandar
description: '''Afifa Iskandar Estefan'''  ({{langx|ar|عفيفة إسكندر إصطيفان}}, 10 December 1921 in [[Mosul]], Iraq - 21 October 2012) was an [[Iraqi people|Iraqi]] singer active from the mid-1930s to the first decade of the 21st century. She was considered one of the best female singers in Iraqi history. She was nicknamed the "Iraqi Blackbird".
